title: Is there a song with the lyrics “baby I want you to know that. . .”? It was sung by a boy if I remember it rightly. - Quora

response.answer_text: I want you to know is sung by Donell Jones. John 13:34 “A new command I give you: Love one another. As I have loved you, so you must love one another.” I Want You To Know - Donell Jones
Got it, it’s Island from Akon.
